name: Heavenly Golf
description:
I made this in a day, hoping I could make it for the Mini Jam 119 : Heaven² but it's a buggy mess and ran out of time for the main mechanic and it's really not polished.

If university isn't too rough I will likely update this project and try to figure out this mess, if anyone wants any progress update on this, DM me at L3mmy♡#2307 on Discord.

Hoping to make it in time so I can submit late-

Yes I'm aware that both builds are screwed but I don't have time to fix it :<
